title: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build your first website.

title: React for Beginners
description: Start building interactive UIs using React, JSX, and component-based architecture.

title: Advanced JavaScript
description: Deep dive into modern JavaScript concepts like closures, promises, and async/await.

title: AI & Machine Learning Basics
description: Understand the fundamentals of AI and machine learning with hands-on projects.
